articles.title: AFI AGM to discuss ways to popularise javelin throw, race walking, 400m, distance running
articles.description: The Athletics Federation of India (AFI) will discuss ways to popularise distance running at the district level and javelin throw, race walking and 400m events across the country at its two-day Annual General Meeting here this weekend.
